title: Cant create or join lobbys
body: When i press play the button turns gray and nothing else happens. I tried reinstalling, i used the repair tool but nothing helps. Please help because i really wanna play lol. Thank you. {{champion:105}}

replies.body: If you're fully patched to 7.13 but getting this issue, then your connection might be unstable and kicking you from matchmaking.  This would prevent you from hitting Play.  To start, my suggestion is to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to clear up any blocks.  Let me know if you have any questions about that.
